description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Vanua Levu, Fiji. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.vendor_name: Koro Sun Resort and Rainforest Spa
hotels.title: Oceanfront Vanua Levu Island Sanctuary with Fiji's Only Floating Bures
hotels.description: Escape to the secluded tropical hideaway of Koro Sun Resort & Rainforest Spa, where the rainforest meets the reef. Surrounded by 160 acres of lush jungle sanctuary and cradled by the cerulean waters of a private lagoon, spend your days by the infinity pool, indulging in spa treatments, swimming in the lagoon or exploring nearby diving spots. With three vibrant restaurants and lively bars, as well as the country's only floating bures, you'll have everything you need to enjoy unforgettable moments in this dreamy paradise.

seo.title: Hoteles en Vanua Levu - Fiji Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Vanua Levu, Fiji con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
